amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding extending the $1,000 child credit for three additional years (2011-2013).

vote.text: Amendment SA 431 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 107.

action.text: Amendment SA 431 proposed by Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S4412-4413; text: CR S4412) To express the sense of the Senate regarding extending the $1,000 child credit for three additional years (2011-2013).
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 431 proposed by Senator Lincoln.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 431 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 107.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 431 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 1. Record Vote Number: 107.
